mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, RESUM_NO, OPN_CHK, RESUM_NAME, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHN_DATE FROM RESUM WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} ORDER BY RESUM_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM RESUM WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT NAME, REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE,'(.{3})(.+)(.{4})','\1-\2-\3') PHONE, EMAIL, BIRTH, GENDER_NAME,PROF_PIC FROM MEMBER M JOIN I_MEMBER IM ON (M.MEM_NO = IM.MEM_NO) JOIN (SELECT CAT_NAME GENDER_NAME, SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE WHERE FST_CAT = 2) CMG ON (CMG.SCD_CAT = IM.GENDER) WHERE WDRAWL_DATE IS NULL AND M.MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT R.MEM_NO, RESUM_NO, OPN_CHK,OPN_CHK_NAME, RESUM_NAME, CITY_NAME, REGION_NAME, CITY_NO, R.REGION_NO, GRADU,GENDER_NAME, BIRTH,R.SECTOR_NO, SECTOR_NAME, NAME, REGEXP_REPLACE(PHONE,'(.{3})(.+)(.{4})','\1-\2-\3') PHONE, EMAIL,PROF_PIC, PAY_GBN, PAY_MIN, PAY_MAX, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHN_DATE, CARR, CARR_NAME, CARR_PER FROM RESUM R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN I_MEMBER IM ON (R.MEM_NO = IM.MEM_NO) JOIN (SELECT CITY_NAME, REGION_NAME, REGION_NO, RE.CITY_NO FROM REGION RE JOIN CITY C ON(C.CITY_NO = RE.CITY_NO)) RE ON (R.REGION_NO = RE.REGION_NO) JOIN (SELECT CAT_NAME GENDER_NAME, SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE WHERE FST_CAT = 2) CMG ON (CMG.SCD_CAT = IM.GENDER) JOIN (SELECT CAT_NAME CARR_NAME, SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE WHERE FST_CAT = 6) CMC ON (CMC.SCD_CAT = R.CARR) JOIN (SELECT CAT_NAME OPN_CHK_NAME, SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE WHERE FST_CAT = 4) CMO ON (CMO.SCD_CAT = R.OPN_CHK) JOIN SECTOR S ON (R.SECTOR_NO = S.SECTOR_NO) WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND R.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT CAT_NAME AS WORK_TYPE_NAME, WORK_TYPE , SCD_CAT FROM COMM_CODE
LEFT OUTER
JOIN RESUM_WORK RW ON ( SCD_CAT = WORK_TYPE AND RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo} ) LEFT OUTER JOIN RESUM R ON ( RW.RESUM_NO = R.RESUM_NO AND R.DEL_CHK = 0 ) WHERE FST_CAT = 3 ORDER BY SCD_CAT

SELECT C.CITY_NAME, RE.REGION_NAME, LOC_NO, RE.CITY_NO, RE.REGION_NO FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_LOC RL ON (R.RESUM_NO = RL.RESUM_NO) JOIN REGION RE ON (RE.REGION_NO = RL.REGION_NO) JOIN CITY C ON (C.CITY_NO = RE.CITY_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT RQ.QUAL_NO, TO_CHAR(PASS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PASS_DATE, ISSU_AGCY, QUAL_NAME FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_QUAL RQ ON (R.RESUM_NO = RQ.RESUM_NO) JOIN QUAL Q ON (RQ.QUAL_NO = Q.QUAL_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT RF.FLANG_NO, FLANG_TYPE, FLANG_GRADE, FLANG_NAME FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_FLANG RF ON (R.RESUM_NO = RF.RESUM_NO) JOIN FLANG F ON (RF.FLANG_NO = F.FLANG_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT C_NAME, DPART, POS, TO_CHAR(ST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ST_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, TURE_CHK, CARR_CNTT FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_CARR RC ON (R.RESUM_NO = RC.RESUM_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT SCH_NAME, SOL, MAJOR, TO_CHAR(ST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ST_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, EDU_ETC FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_EDU RE ON (R.RESUM_NO = RE.RESUM_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT IEDU_NAME, COSE_NAME, TO_CHAR(ST_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ST_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, EDU_CNTT FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_IEDU RI ON (R.RESUM_NO = RI.RESUM_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}
SELECT SINTRO_NAME, SINTRO_CNTT FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_SINTRO RS ON (R.RESUM_NO = RS.RESUM_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}
SELECT ATTCH_NAME FROM RESUM R JOIN RESUM_ATTCH RA ON (R.RESUM_NO = RA.RESUM_NO) WHERE R.DEL_CHK = 0 AND MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND R.RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}

SELECT QUAL_CNT, FLANG_CNT, CARR_CNT, EDU_CNT, IEDU_CNT, SINTRO_CNT, ATTCH_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) QUAL_CNT FROM RESUM_QUAL WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) Q, (SELECT COUNT(*) FLANG_CNT FROM RESUM_FLANG WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) F, (SELECT COUNT(*) CARR_CNT FROM RESUM_CARR WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) C, (SELECT COUNT(*) EDU_CNT FROM RESUM_EDU WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) E, (SELECT COUNT(*) IEDU_CNT FROM RESUM_IEDU WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) I, (SELECT COUNT(*) SINTRO_CNT FROM RESUM_SINTRO WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) S, (SELECT COUNT(*) ATTCH_CNT FROM RESUM_ATTCH WHERE RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}) A
SELECT REGION_NO, REGION_NAME FROM REGION WHERE CITY_NO = #{cityNo} ORDER BY REGION_NO

SELECT SECTOR_NO, SECTOR_NAME FROM (SELECT SECTOR_NO, SECTOR_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SECTOR_NO) AS RNUM FROM SECTOR WHERE SECTOR_NAME like '%'||#{schDataName}||'%') S WHERE S.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM SECTOR WHERE SECTOR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{schDataName}||'%'

SELECT QUAL_NO, QUAL_NAME FROM (SELECT QUAL_NO, QUAL_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY QUAL_NO) AS RNUM FROM QUAL WHERE QUAL_NAME like '%'||#{schDataName}||'%') Q WHERE Q.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QUAL WHERE QUAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#{schDataName}||'%'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESUM_SINTRO WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUM_QUAL( RESUM_NO, QUAL_NO, PASS_DATE, ISSU_AGCY ) VALUES ( #{resumeNo}, #{qualNo}, #{passDate}, #{issuAgcy} )
INSERT INTO RESUM_FLANG( MNG_NO, RESUM_NO, FLANG_NO, FLANG_TYPE, FLANG_GRADE ) VALUES ( RESUM_FLANG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resumeNo}, #{flangNo}, #{flangType}, #{flangGrade} )

INSERT INTO RESUM_CARR( CARR_NO, RESUM_NO, C_NAME, DPART, POS, ST_DATE, END_DATE, TURE_CHK, CARR_CNTT ) VALUES ( RESUM_CARR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resumeNo}, #{cName}, #{dpart}, #{pos}, #{carrStDate}, #{carrEndDate}, #{tureChk}, #{carrCntt} )

INSERT INTO RESUM_EDU( EDU_NO, RESUM_NO, SCH_NAME, SOL, MAJOR, ST_DATE, END_DATE, EDU_ETC ) VALUES ( RESUM_EDU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resumeNo}, #{schName}, #{sol}, #{major}, #{eduStDate}, #{eduEndDate}, #{eduCntt} )

INSERT INTO RESUM_IEDU( IEDU_NO, RESUM_NO, IEDU_NAME, COSE_NAME, ST_DATE, END_DATE, EDU_CNTT ) VALUES ( RESUM_IEDU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resumeNo}, #{ieduName}, #{coseName}, #{ieduStDate}, #{ieduEndDate}, #{ieduCntt} )
INSERT INTO RESUM_SINTRO( SINTRO_NO, RESUM_NO, SINTRO_NAME, SINTRO_CNTT ) VALUES ( RESUM_SINTRO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resumeNo}, #{sintroName}, #{sintroCntt} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE RESUM SET SECTOR_NO = #{sectorNo}, REGION_NO = #{region}, RESUM_NAME = #{resumeName}, OPN_CHK = #{openCase}, GRADU = #{gradu}, PAY_GBN = #{sal}, CARR = #{carr},
PAY_MAX = 0, PAY_MIN = 0,
PAY_MAX = #{salMax}, PAY_MIN = #{salMin},
CARR_PER = 0,
CARR_PER = #{carrPer},
CHN_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE DEL_CHK = 0 AND RESUM_NO = #{resumeNo}
